We are an official training center with a state accreditation, and the maintainer for Silex and amfPhp projects.Thanks for your support !Silex HistoryFounded in 2003 by Alexandre Hoyau, Pol Goasdoué and Pierre Teissière. The project is turned toward video and cross media.In 2005, the version v0-6 is presented at the WWDC2005 in Cupertino California. Apple is interested in Flash capacity to compete with their Quicktime plug-in. Macromedia has just been acquired by Adobe, Apples main partner.In 2006, Silex is presented in several conferences at La Villette and wins a challenge organized by Dauphine high school with INRIA - French National institute for research in computer science and control. Silex is mainly used for freelancers small projectsIn 2007, Silex sources are officially released as open sourceIn 2008, Silex is among the 100 first Open Source projects on SourceForge. Silex v1 is released and the community becomes significantIn 2009, Silex is project of the month on SourceForge. The organization became the official maintainer of AMFPHP, mature communautary project.References[[http://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/SILEX-RIA]][[http://silex-ria.org/?/open.source.flash.cms/silex/a.propos/histoire/presentation]][[http://www.flex888.com/1194/silex-the-june-sourceforge-potm.html]][[http://sourceforge.net/projects/silex/files/]][[http://sourceforge.net/project/stats/?group_id=192954&ugn=silex&type=&mode=alltime]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/2009/06/stat-is-stuck/]][[http://sourceforge.net/blog/potm-200906/]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/2009/05/silex-on-the-scene/]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/2009/06/soisson-pour-les-nuls/]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/2009/06/423/]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/fr/2009/06/the-sunday-workshop-inside-wikiplaza/]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/en/a-propos/]][[http://amfphp.sourceforge.net/about.html]][[http://www.topflashcms.com/flash-cms-news/the-silex-revolution-the-art-of-sculpting-anything-anywhere-and-by-anyone/]][[http://www.thetechlabs.com/latest/web-roundups-7-free-flash-cms/]][[http://www.silexlabs.org/the-blog/en/2010/07/annonce-de-silex-v1-6/]]

About us :-)

The Silex team members have decided to formalize theire cooperation by creating a non profit organization for the promotion, support for deployment and the development of open source software projects SILEX and Open Source Flash related.

The goal is to promote the software and its related projects nationally and internationally. We are an official training center with a state accreditation, and the maintainer for Silex and amfPhp projects.

Thanks for your support !

Silex History

Founded in 2003 by Alexandre Hoyau, Pol Goasdoué and Pierre Teissière. The project is turned toward video and cross media.

In 2005, the version v0-6 is presented at the WWDC2005 in Cupertino California. Apple is interested in Flash capacity to compete with their Quicktime plug-in. Macromedia has just been acquired by Adobe, Apples main partner.

In 2006, Silex is presented in several conferences at La Villette and wins a challenge organized by Dauphine high school with INRIA - French National institute for research in computer science and control. Silex is mainly used for freelancers small projects

In 2007, Silex sources are officially released as open source

In 2008, Silex is among the 100 first Open Source projects on SourceForge. Silex v1 is released and the community becomes significant

In 2009, Silex is project of the month on SourceForge. The team is invited to present Silex at several French conference: Futur en Seine, Les Trophées du Libre, Pas sage en Seine, Wikiplaza

In 2010, Silex team members have decided to formalize theire cooperation by creating a non profit organization for the promotion, support for deployment and the development of open source software projects SILEX and Open Source Flash related.. The organization became the official maintainer of AMFPHP, mature communautary project.
